Plot: A pair of young lovers flee their New England town, which causes a local search party to fan out to find them.
Title: Moonrise Kingdom
Actors: Bruce Willis, Edward Norton, Bill Murray, Frances McDormand
tomatoConsensus: Warm, whimsical, and poignant, the immaculately framed and beautifully acted Moonrise Kingdom presents writer/director Wes Anderson at his idiosyncratic best.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 37 wins & 115 nominations.
